Sentencas: Dissolved gas analysis (DGA) is vital to status evaluation of power transformers.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: In this study, a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) gas sensor was fabricated and applied to DGA.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: Then, a gas chromatographic system was developed on basis of the SOFC detector.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: From Nernst function of SOFC, a mathematical model based on oxygen consumption accumulation (OCA) has been proposed to quantify trace gases dissolved in oil.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: Based on the OCA of SOFC, the gas concentration can be calculated though the chromatogram directly, no calibrating gas is needed, thereby greatly simplifying the quantification process.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: Following peak detection based on the improved filter matching method, tests were conducted to verify the validity of the OCA method.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: The experimental results demonstrated that the repeatability represented by relative standard deviation is less than 0.5%; high precision can be achieved, measurement error for five feature gases are less than 10% at given concentrations, providing a competitive performance against other gas sensors with curve fitting method.
Titulo: SOFC Detector With OCA Approach to Quantify Trace Gases Dissolved in Transformer Oil
